Description: National Institute of Standards and Technology

Scope: Protocols (develops internet standards, including many with cryptographic aspects)
Security (works on cybersecurity issues within the European Union)
Telecom (focuses on mobile communications standards, often with cryptographic elements)

Description: NIST program that validates the cryptographic modules against FIPS 140 standards
Scope: Security (validates cryptographic modules for conformance to FIPS 140 standards)

Description: International standard for computer security evaluation (includes cryptographic aspects)
Scope: Security (evaluates security properties of IT products)
International standards for electrical electronic and related technologies

Description: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
Scope: Standards for electrical electronics and computer engineering

Description: Payment Card Industry Security Standards Council
Scope: Security standards for payment card data
Open-source community focused on web application security
Best practices and resources for cybersecurity

Description: Information Systems Audit and Control Association
Develops specifications for secure digital services
Scope: Security standards for secure digital ecosystems
Develops standards for information and communication technologies

Description: Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards
Scope: Develops open standards for information exchange

Description: Develops and promotes standards for trusted computing
